abilityNameJapanese: 風来砲（クー・ド・ブー）
description: Franky inflates his buttocks to an enormous size using compressed gas/air, then releases it all at once in a powerful fart-based propulsion attack. The explosive release creates enough force to break chains and propel Franky (and anyone he's carrying) significant distances.

firstUse.context: Franky used Coup de Boo to escape from Spandam and the Marines, tricking them into thinking he was self-destructing. The attack broke his chains and propelled him and Robin out onto the balcony.
firstUse.effectiveness: Highly effective - successfully broke chains, cleared a room of Marines, and enabled escape

limitations: Uses significant amounts of stored cola
Primarily used for propulsion/escape rather than direct damage
Comedic nature may make opponents underestimate it
symbolism: Represents Franky's unconventional and creative approach to combat, mixing comedy with effectiveness.

culturalReferences.reference: The name 'Coup de Boo' is a pun combining the French 'coup de' (meaning 'blow of') with 'boo' (Japanese onomatopoeia for flatulence)
culturalReferences.significance: Reflects One Piece's typical wordplay and humor in technique names
